articles.title: Why I almost had Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro arrested
articles.description: Argentinian Opposition Leader Patricia Bullrich deployed a DEA indictment — and potential $15 million reward -- to prevent Venezuelan strongman Nicolas Maduro from entering Argentina.
articles.content: Late last month, Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro had expected to attend the seventh Community of Latin American Caribbean States (CELAC) summit in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Along with representing his nation — and positioning himself as a regional... [7070 chars]

articles.title: How a bomb in his home forced Heritage Minister’s family to flee to Canada
articles.description: Heritage Minister Pablo Rodriguez’s family fled Argentina to Canada as refugees when he was almost eight years old. His father was a lawyer defending political prisoners and in 1973 ran for governor in Argentina’s Northern Tucuman province

articles.title: Lionel Messi considering playing on until 2026 World Cup: Report
articles.description: Argentina captain Lionel Messi has left open the possibility of playing at the 2026 FIFA World Cup, but says his participation will depend on 'many things'.
articles.content:

articles.title: Lionel Messi Clarifies Argetina Retirement, Opens Up on Playing 2026 FIFA World Cup
articles.description: After hoisting his first World Cup trophy with Argentina in December, Lionel Messi said that tournament would be his last, but now it appears he's open to the possibility of playing in the 2026 event
articles.content:
Lionel Messi inspired Argentina to their third World Cup trophy, his first, after beating France in the final at Qatar 2022 back in December.
